name: Kit n' Witch
description:
Kit n' Witch Submission for the Global Game Jam - 2022

A witch has been separated from her kitten. Or better yet, a Kitten has been separated from her witch! Ascend the level in order to reunite with one another.

Contributors 

ObscurelyMe - UI Programmer

Arthur - Gameplay / Audio Programmer

DomNapkin - Gameplay Programmer

Isistinti - Artist

DadHatTony - Composer
